text: Žana Lelas (28 May 1970 – 15 September 2021) was a Croatian professional basketball player. She represented Yugoslavia and Croatia. She won a silver medal at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Olympic silver medalists for Yugoslavia Category:Sportspeople from Split Category:Yugoslavian basketball players
title: Žana Lelas
